short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to enhance overall web surfing experience. For example remove AI overview etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of distracting or irrelevant content cluttering your favorite websites? Amped streamlines your browsing experience by automatically removing unnecessary sections, like the AI Overview on Google, and other similar elements on various websites. With a cleaner interface, you can focus on what matters most without the noise. Customize your web experience effortlessly with just a few clicks!
